metadata.title: CVE-2024-56642 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:tipc: Fix use-after-free of kernel socket in cleanup_bearer().syzkaller reported a use-after-free of UDP kernel socketin cleanup_bearer() without repro. [0][1]When bearer_disable() calls tipc_udp_disable(), cleanupof the UDP kernel socket is deferred by work callingcleanup_bearer().tipc_net_stop() waits for such works to finish by checkingtipc_net(net)->wq_count.  However, the work decrements thecount too early before releasing the kernel socket,unblocking cleanup_net() and resulting in use-after-free.Let's move the decrement after releasing the socket
